name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Field Engineer with 13+ years of experience delivering high-performance applications, predominantly in the healthcare and financial sectors. Possesses strong technical expertise in JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, and Flutter, with hands-on proficiency in both frontend and backend technologies, including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Demonstrated problem-solving skills through building AI/ML-powered platforms utilizing predictive analytics and real-time processing.

Flexibility in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, alongside implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines. Adept at aligning solutions with compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Strong communication skills complemented by a solid foundation in MLOps, incorporating model training, serving, and orchestration through tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Motivated to innovate and enhance operational efficiencies across projects.

experience.responsibilities:
• Demonstrated **technical expertise** by designing and building full-stack platforms for healthcare and fintech using **Python (FastAPI)**, **TypeScript**, and **Node.js**, ensuring compliance with critical regulations such as HIPAA and GDPR.
• Leveraged strong **problem-solving skills** to deliver mobile applications for iOS and Android using **Flutter** and **React Native**, incorporating native modules for secure, real-time user interactions and managing state with **Provider** and **Redux**.
• Exhibited **flexibility** in creating CI/CD pipelines tailored for mobile using **Fastlane** and **App Center**, implementing test automation with **Firebase Crashlytics** and **Sentry** that improved deployment efficiency by **30%**.
• Utilized **communication** skills to lead the transformation of legacy systems into microservices architectures, implementing **Docker**, **Kubernetes (AKS/EKS)**, and leveraging **AWS Lambda** for scalable deployments.
• Built and maintained a robust data infrastructure using **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, **Redis**, and **GraphQL**, designed to support heavy data ingestion and enabling **real-time analytics** for diverse domains.
• Deployed ML models for risk scoring and fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **PyTorch**, and **TensorFlow**, with backend inference achieving a **95%** accuracy rate in live systems.
• Implemented MLOps workflows using **MLflow**, **DVC**, and **Airflow**, managing model training and deployment pipelines effectively across **3** environments.
• Integrated intelligent features into frontend applications, powered by models hosted on **Azure ML** and **AWS Sagemaker**, enhancing user experience through personalized dashboards.
• Developed robust DevOps pipelines with **GitHub Actions**, **CircleCI**, and **Azure DevOps**, achieving full test automation and reducing deployment time by **40%**.
• Created advanced data visualization tools with **D3.js**, **Chart.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing insights on **financial activity** and **operational KPIs** in real-time.
• Collaborated with ML teams to deploy NLP models using **spaCy** and **Hugging Face Transformers**, ensuring secure REST APIs for document parsing.
• Defined and enforced comprehensive testing strategies using **Jest**, **Cypress**, **Postman**, and **PyTest**, ensuring 100% coverage for unit, integration, and E2E tests.
• Integrated search capabilities using **Azure Cognitive Search** and **Elasticsearch**, supporting versatile querying across health and financial datasets.

Utilized **technical expertise** to modernize core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture using **Node.js (NestJS/Express)** and **Python (FastAPI, Django)**, enhancing scalability and performance for **high-volume transactional systems**.
Leveraged excellent **problem-solving skills** to build interactive front-end applications with **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, utilizing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to create sleek, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels.
Communicated effectively with stakeholders to deliver real-time analytics dashboards with **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with instant insights into transactions and anomalies, enhancing decision-making.
Demonstrated **flexibility** in designing and deploying a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication across critical workflows such as payments, alerts, and compliance.
Applied strong **motivation** to develop ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, supporting both batch and real-time processing of financial data.
Constructed and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activity based on user behavior and transaction patterns, significantly reducing fraudulent transactions by over **30%**.
Created ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services, impacting customer retention positively.

Utilized **technical expertise** to design and optimize backend services for a global e-commerce platform leveraging **Python (FastAPI, Django)** and **Node.js (NestJS, Express)**, ensuring high availability, low latency, and scalability across key modules like checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.
Demonstrated **problem-solving skills** by engineering real-time features using **WebSockets** and event-driven architecture supported by **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, enabling responsive order updates and dynamic inventory tracking.
Exhibited **flexibility** in developing frontend applications using **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, and **Angular**, enhanced with **TypeScript**, **Redux Toolkit**, and **Tailwind CSS**, delivering fast and responsive user experiences on both web and mobile platforms.
Successfully leveraged **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **Cassandra** for distributed data storage, ensuring fast, fault-tolerant data access for high-traffic e-commerce workflows (with a **10x** performance increase) and caching frequently accessed resources for performance gains.
Integrated AI/ML-based recommendation engines using **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow**, personalizing product listings, optimizing search relevance, and improving conversion rates by **25%** based on real-time behavioral data.
Implemented **Redis** caching for product metadata, shopping cart sessions, and search results, significantly improving application responsiveness (by **40%**) and reducing read pressure on databases.
Applied strong **communication** skills when implementing feature flags and blue-green deployments using **LaunchDarkly** and **Kubernetes** namespaces, enabling controlled rollouts, A/B testing, and risk mitigation during major platform updates.
Created responsive, SEO-friendly e-commerce UIs using **Next.js**, **Vue 3 + Nuxt**, and **HTML5/CSS3**, optimized for mobile-first engagement and accessibility compliance (WCAG **2.1**).
Established secure payment workflows integrated with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, applying tokenized transactions and ensuring PCI-compliance for handling sensitive data.
Applied role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** for secure customer and admin access, ensuring GDPR compliance and robust user data protection throughout the platform.
